DataElement.preferredName: Initial Laboratory Procedure Human Chorionic Gonadotropin Beta Subunit Value Outcome Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date related to initial laboratory procedure from the beta subunit of human chorionic gonadotropin.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Initial Laboratory Procedure Human Chorionic Gonadotropin Beta Subunit Value Outcome
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: occurring at the beginning._Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting._The beta subunit of human chorionic gonadotropin. It is used as a clinical marker to facilitate early detection of normal pregnancy and significantly contributes to the diagnosis of various pregnancy-related disorders, such as ectopic pregnancy, spontaneous abortion, hydatidiform mole, choriocarcinoma, or Trisomy 21. Further, determination of this marker is immensely helpful to guide curative intervention in testicular cancer. Other possible clinical uses includes as a marker of cancers of the bladder, pancreas, or biliary tract. (Scan J Clin Lab Invest Suppl 1993;216:97-104)_A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed._a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen._The result of an action.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: occurring at the beginning.:Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredName: Human Chorionic Gonadotropin Beta Subunit Value Outcome
Property.preferredDefinition: The beta subunit of human chorionic gonadotropin. It is used as a clinical marker to facilitate early detection of normal pregnancy and significantly contributes to the diagnosis of various pregnancy-related disorders, such as ectopic pregnancy, spontaneous abortion, hydatidiform mole, choriocarcinoma, or Trisomy 21. Further, determination of this marker is immensely helpful to guide curative intervention in testicular cancer. Other possible clinical uses includes as a marker of cancers of the bladder, pancreas, or biliary tract. (Scan J Clin Lab Invest Suppl 1993;216:97-104):A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: Choriogonadotropin subunit beta 3 (165 aa, ~18 kDa) is encoded by the human CGB3, CGB5, and CGB8 genes. This protein is involved in the regulation of steroid synthesis during pregnancy.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
